title: Amy’s Dad Getting Tested for Coronavirus + Raymundo Shares Mother/Son Dance Songs + Chris Janson Doing Something For The First Time Ever
itunes:title: Amy’s Dad Getting Tested for Coronavirus + Raymundo Shares Mother/Son Dance Songs + Chris Janson Doing Something For The First Time Ever
description:
Amy shares an update on her dad who is living in an assisted living facility where a caregiver has tested positive for coronavirus. Raymundo brings in five songs to pitch for his mother/son dance at his October wedding. Plus, we talk fishing, Opry and working out with Chris Janson!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
